Darkfate:

"It's seems that enemy it's in side his base altought any information 
it's sure..." said Darkfate "Do you think that exist a way to destroy 
the shields like enemy's base?"

Darkfate suddenly has a idea and aske to Galvatron "Do you have BOmbs 
with high power???"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra/Triggerhappy/Skullgrin::
> 
>         Orchestra was ready to get in action, but he didn't 
comprehend the
> situation.
> 
>          "Um, Sir, if you don't mind my asking, what is the current
> situation?" He asked kindly, trying not to sound stupid.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>           Triggerhappy fired his gun at the ground left of Condor, 
then the
> right, trying to scare Condor.
> 
>            "You better watch what you do or say, or else next time 
I'll
> shoot for the center!" He said.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>            Skullgrin transformed back to robot mode.  He was hit by
> Cheetor's blades, and tumbled back a bit, then he was hit by Hot 
Rod's
> missiles, and went flying back, then hit the ground.  At least in 
robot mode
> he could take a cold and logical approach to battle instead of 
going brawns
> over brains.  He decided to go to where he could detect 
Triggerhappy from
> far away, and go back to the temporary Decepticon base.
